pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, May 14 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, May 14, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

Personal


Media appearance

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on City TV between 11:30 a.m. and 1:30 p.m.  for Festival Italiano di Johnny Lombardi.
